channel.title: Classic Upgrade on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Classic Upgrade on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Brompton Reborn: How to Future-Proof a Decades-Old Foldable Bike
item.description: Thanks to a design that remains largely unchanged in 50 years, even vintage examples of the original iconic folding bike can be made fit for the 21st century.
